config.njb.title: Not Just Biomes Config
module.njb.birch_forest.desc: Taller trees, more bee nests and other decorations
module.njb.cherry_grove.desc: Bamboo, rocks, and more types of flowers
module.njb.dungeon.desc: More variants of vanilla dungeons with more decorations
module.njb.forest.desc: Natural clearings, taller trees, fallen logs and other decorations
module.njb.ore_vein.desc: Smaller, denser veins of ore like the iron/copper veins in vanilla
module.njb.swamp.desc: Mud pools containing Dripleaves across the surface
module.njb.taiga.desc: Natural clearings, fallen logs, mossy rocks and other decorations
module.njb.tectonic_trees.desc: Custom trees formerly a part of Tectonic
module.njb.well.desc: New variants of the Desert Well in more biomes
